short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest way to boost productivity by time blocking right on your calendar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
[New*] Now you can drag and drop items directly into Google Calendar for time blocking!

Adds an event aware todo list next to your Google Calendar to better plan your work week, automate time blocking, and boost productivity
